name: Hay Bunny Farm - Find The Farm Mystery And Crazy Hidden Object
name_original: Hay Bunny Farm - Find The Farm Mystery And Crazy Hidden Object
description:
Download Now!!
Hidden Challenges and find the secret of Bunny's Farm!

Get involved in this great Point and Click and solve the mystery!

Some great features:
- Explore through the atmosphere of mystery
- A wide variety of objects to search and puzzles to solve
- This game works in offline mode without Internet
- Buy unlimited hints
- Most amazing level and ultimate hidden spot and object
- Find yourself in the world of pure madness!
- Never-ending mystic game play
- Incredible graphics
- Original soundtrack and effects.
